<QuestionSource url="https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/DFII30">
## Summary of Article

**Source:** FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data), St. Louis Federal Reserve

**Key Information:**

1. **Data Series Details:**
   - Series ID: DFII30
   - Title: Market Yield on U.S. Treasury Securities at 30-Year Constant Maturity, Quoted on an Investment Basis, Inflation-Indexed
   - Units: Percent
   - Frequency: Daily
   - Seasonal Adjustment: Not Seasonally Adjusted
   - Data Source: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (US)
   - Release: H.15 Selected Interest Rates

2. **Reference Information:**
   - The article directs users to H.15 Statistical Release notes and the Treasury Yield Curve Methodology for further information regarding treasury constant maturity data
   - Contact information is provided for data-related questions (data source) and FRED functionality questions

3. **Citation Information:**
   - Suggested citation format is provided for the data series

**Note:** This article is essentially a metadata page from FRED describing the DFII30 series. It does not contain any actual data values, forecasts, expert opinions, or analysis. It only provides technical information about the data series itself, its source, and where to find additional methodology information.
</QuestionSource>
